Module vimdaloo ¶

The root vimdaloo module.

Setup ¶

Required to bootstrap the system

-- accept the defaults
require('vimdaloo').setup()

-- or override the defaults
require('vimdaloo').setup({
    env = _G,
    base_path = vim and 'lua' or 'src',
})

API ¶

Synopsis

Functions
setup()

bootstraps the vimdaloo system
setup(config) ¶

bootstraps the vimdaloo system

Parameters
config (table)

optional custom user configuration
